name: Tide Infecter
text:
Whenever Tide Infecter attacks, defending player loses 2 life.
Flood {2}{u}{b} ({2}{u}{b}, Exile this card from your hand: Target land loses all land types and abilities and has "{T}: Add {c}." Flood only as a sorcery.) 
Whenever you flood Tide Infecter, that land gains "Whenever this land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life."
